properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 14 at 7:35PM MST by NWS Great Falls MT
properties.description:
The snow showers over much of Judith Basin and Fergus Counties
have generally weakened since 630 pm.

However, some brief heavy snow showers will continue to move over
southern Fergus County, including the Lewistown area, through
around 830 pm.

These showers may reduce visibility to less than 3 miles at times,
and it will likely cause roads to become icy or snow-covered. Be
careful driving around southern Fergus County, and be prepared to
adapt to changing road conditions.

NWSheadline: Snow showers continue to weaken this evening
